summary: Replaces all female NPCs with highpoly Citrus heads and KS Hairdos hair.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This mod replaces all female NPCs faces (1500+), including no-names (bandits, vampires, etc ..) with highpoly Citrus heads and KS hairdos hair. [color=#ff7700]BETA TESTING[/color][/size]

Races included: [color=#a4c2f4][color=#f9cb9c]Breton, Redguard, Imperials, Nord, HighElf, DarkElf, WoodElf[/color] [/color]and[color=#a4c2f4] [color=#f9cb9c]Orcs[/color][/color]. They are [color=#a4c2f4]autogenerated[/color] with custom morphs and currently condsidred a beta test. Although the polycount on the hair has been reduced, it is still a load heavy mod and therefore only recommended for high-end PCs.

[color=#f9cb9c]
If you have a [color=#ff7700]female player character[/color] that is not a custom race, argonian, or kajiit, you might have to start a new game if your head is disfigured and can't be reset with 'showracemenu'.

Racemenu presets are not yet working.


[u]Requirements:[/u][/color]
Dawnguard
Dragonborn
Hearthfires
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch
[/url]RaceOverhaul - Textures (or Fair Skin Complexion or any other complete texture mod)


[color=#f9cb9c][u]Recommended:[/u][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73848/?]Tetrachromatic ENB
[/url]

[color=#f9cb9c][u]Compatibility:[/u][/color]
Since this mod replaces the default headparts, [color=#f6b26b]other Follower and NPC Replacer mods are[/color] [color=#f6b26b]not compatible[/color] unless they are[color=#6d9eeb] custom race[/color] and have their own feamalehead.nif and .tri files.
Mods that don't have patches will either have tint mismatch or the face will not animate. However, their faces can be rebuilt to a Citrus head in Creation Kit[color=#c9daf8][i]. [size=2](Look below how to do it).[/size][/i][/color] It only takes a couple of minutes.

Please report any weird occurences.


[color=#f9cb9c][u]Installation:[/u][/color]
Tested with NMM (Nexus Mod Manager)


[color=#f9cb9c][u]Load Order:[/u][/color]
Try to put the esp as low as possible in your load order.


[color=#f9cb9c][u]To Do:
[/u][/color][color=#b6d7a8]- Additional Racemenu Morphs (Currently only vanilla working)[/color]
[color=#f6b26b][s]- Vampire Eyes (Bugged)[/s][/color] [color=#93c47d]fixed [color=#f4f4f4]in version 1.1[/color][/color]
[color=#f6b26b]- Glossy Eyes bug

[/color]
[color=#f9cb9c]
[u]Mod authors and impatient people:[/u]
[/color]If you want to create a patch for your mod, you can do the following in Creation Kit:

[color=#ff7700][b]1.[/b][color=#ffffff]Temporarily Uninstall/Disable Head texture mods during these steps[/color][b][color=#ffffff].[/color] [/b][/color][color=#f4f4f4][size=2](You will get the red forehead bug if you don't do this)[/size][/color][color=#ff7700][b]
2.[/b][/color] Add these lines to the [color=#fce5cd]SkyrimEditor.ini[/color] [color=#a4c2f4](leave the ',' comma after [/color][color=#a4c2f4][size=1][size=2][i]0_Kas_Citrus_heads.bsa[/i][/size][/size])[/color]
[i][color=#fce5cd][size=2]
[General][/size][/color][/i][size=1][i][size=2]
ballowmultiplemasterloads=1
[color=#fce5cd][Archive][/color]
SResourceArchiveList2=Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Update.bsa, DawnGuard.bsa, HearthFires.bsa, Dragonborn.bsa,[/size][/i][size=2][i] 0_Kas_Citrus_heads.bsa,[/i]
[/size]
[color=#ff7700][size=2][b]3.[/b][/size][/color][size=2] Load your mod.esp + my .esp in CreationKit [color=#a4c2f4](Cancel all error messages)
[/color][color=#ff7700][b] 4.[/b][/color] [color=#f6b26b][b]Select[/b][/color] your NPCs you want to convert and press [color=#f6b26b][b]CTRL + F4[/b][/color]
[i]  [color=#c9daf8](It will create new head .nif's (and tints) from the Citrus/KSHairdo assets in the FacegenData/FaceGeom folder.) [/color][/i]
[color=#ff7700][b] 5.[/b] [/color][/size][/size]Reenable/reinstall your texture mods. [size=1][size=2]Done. That's it.[/size][/size][size=2]

[/size]

[color=#f9cb9c][u]Non Custom Race Followers:[/u][/color]
If you want to make your follower 'Custom Race' try this tutorial:
[url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/Creating_a_custom_race_for_Skyrim]Creating a custom race for Skyrim[/url]

If you have a Racemenu/ECE head you can convert it to Citrus/CustomRace with the following Tutorial:[color=#a4c2f4]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84202/?]HowTo - Highpoly CITRUS head conversion for Followers[/url]

[/color]



[img width=646,height=641]http://i.imgur.com/o8qorJ0.jpg[/img]

ENB from screenshot:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73848/?]Tetrachromatic ENB[/url] by [b]Slothability [/b]


CREDITS:

Meshes:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58989/?]CITRUS Heads[/url] by [b]Blabba[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by [b]Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky
[/b]
Textures:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] by [b]HHaleyy[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73512/?]Leyenda Skin[/url] by [b]HeroedeLeyenda[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url] by [b]nevenbridge[/b]

Tools:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62065/?]ToolsPack to work with Blender 2.7[/url][b] by [b]Anton0028[/b]
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/974/?]Bethesda Archive Extractor (BSA and BA2)[/url][b] by [b]jonwd7
[/b][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide and Outfit Studio[/url] by [b]Ousnius and Caliente
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40494/?]NPC Nif Merge[/url] by [b][b]Turulo[/b][/b]
author: Kaspar
